    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
</div></div></div></div></div><div id="glb-corpo"><!-- PUBLIEDITORIAL --><!-- possui template smart --><div class='row bloco-wide'><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_super"><div id="banner_super" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row ge-destaques"><div class="gui-carousel-component-container" id="gui-carousel-highlight"><!-- PASSO 1 --><div class="gui-item-carousel"><div class="small-6 medium-6 large-6 columns gui-carousel-component-left-column"><div class="gui-headline destaque destaque-tracking box-destaque-assunto "><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/apos-susto-e-derrota-lebron-mostra-confianca-nos-cavs-podemos-virar.html"

                <p class="gui-text-headline"><strongnba</strong></p>
            
        

        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/noticia/2017/03/warriors-aceleram-no-fim-batem-os-grizzlies-e-vencem-setima-seguida.html" title="Warriors aceleram no fim, batem os Grizzlies e vencem a sétima seguida" class="gui-color-primary-link gui-feed-title" data-href="https://glo.bo/2n8mKhJ" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/LnD9krRIc6N_bmDMinuQ7F9yVws=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/26/2017-03-27t011414z_1483745548_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-memphis-grizzlies-at-golden-state-warriors.jpg">
            <h3 class="gui-text-title ">Warriors aceleram no fim, batem os Grizzlies e vencem a sétima seguida</h3>
        </a>

        

        
            <p class="gui-text-datetime" >
                
                    23:24 - 26/03/2017
                
            </p>
        

        <div class="share-bar plantao-share" data-theme="minimal" data-url="https://glo.bo/2n8mKhJ" data-title="Warriors aceleram no fim, batem os Grizzlies e vencem a sétima seguida" data-image-url="http://s2.glbimg.com/LnD9krRIc6N_bmDMinuQ7F9yVws=/345x220/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/26/2017-03-27t011414z_1483745548_nocid_rtrmadp_3_nba-memphis-grizzlies-at-golden-state-warriors.jpg"></div>
    </div>
</div>

                <p class="gui-text-headline"><strongnba</strong></p>

        </a>

        

        
            <p class="gui-text-datetime" >
                
                    21:39 - 26/03/2017
                
            </p>

            <div class="glb-grid-2 large-2 column">

    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_pesquisa = "1181961";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.id_embed = "1f2eac6aa132";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app = "pesquisa.globosat.globo.com";
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirJquery = false;
    SVCPesquisaConfig.incluirTrackEvents = 'UA-16233545-1';

var SVCPesquisaDone = false;

var SVCPesquisaLoad = document.createElement("script");
    SVCPesquisaLoad.type = "text/javascript";
    SVCPesquisaLoad.async = true;

SVCPesquisaLoad.onreadystatechange = function() {

var SVCPesquisaState;

if(!SVCPesquisaDone){

    SVCPesquisaState = SVCPesquisaLoad.readyState;

    if(SVCPesquisaState === "complete") {
            SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
        }
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.onload = function(){
    if(!SVCPesquisaDone){
        SVCPesquisaDone = true;
        SVCPesquisa.init(SVCPesquisaConfig);
    }
};

SVCPesquisaLoad.src = 'http://' + SVCPesquisaConfig.dominio_app + '/app.min.js';

var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(SVCPesquisaLoad, s);

        <script src="http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/libby/responsive_hub/js/libby.responsive.hub.js"></script>
        <script>
            window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
            RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
            RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
            RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "http://thumbor.globoi.com";
        </script>
    <script src="http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/static/live/libby/responsive_hub/js/libby.responsive.connector.js"></script>


<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><a href="http://sportv.globo.com" class="logo-produto icon-produto"><span class="logo-produto-container">sportv</span></a><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><div class='logo-area item-editoria tamanho-titulo-normal '><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/" class="logo">nba</a></div><div class=" to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-floating" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search"/><label for="search-input-floating" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><a href="http://sportv.globo.com" class="logo-produto icon-produto"><span class="logo-produto-container">sportv</span></a><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><div class='logo-area item-editoria tamanho-titulo-normal '><h1><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/nba/" class="logo">nba</a></h1></div><div class=" to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-top" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search"/><label for="search-input-top" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div><div id="busca-padrao"></div><div class="banner"><div class="opec-area opec-right"><div class="opec-internal"><script>typeof OAS_AD != "undefined" && OAS_AD("Right")</script><div id="banner_insert" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="opec-mobile-topo" class="opec-area opec-mobile opec-mobile-topo opec-x60"><div class="opec-internal"><div id="banner_mobile_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div><script>typeof OAS_MOBILE != "undefined" && OAS_MOBILE("x60")</script></div></div></header><script>
      window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div               <div class='content'>
                <!-- Start content -->
                  <sib-page-header data-sib-title="_page.teamStats" ></sib-page-header>

<div class="row">
  <div class="col-12">
    <!-- Start Full Team Stats Module -->
<div class="sib-table-container sib-table-full-team-stats" data-ng-controller="FullTeamStatsCtrl" data-ng-cloak>
  <div class="table-title">
    <div class="title">
      <span class="hidden-sm"><span class="season-display">{{filterSeason}}</span><span class="season-type">{{ '_seasonType.' + seasonType | i18next}}</span>{{'fullTeamStats.title' | i18next}}</span>
      <span class="visible-sm" data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.shortTitle"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="table-toggle">
      <div data-state="avg" data-ng-class="{toggled: tabletabbed=='avg'}" data-ng-click="tabletabbed='avg'"><span data-ng-i18next="_stats.AVG"></span></div>
      <div data-state="tot" data-ng-class="{toggled: tabletabbed=='total'}" data-ng-click="tabletabbed='total'; predicate = 'statTotal.points'; reverse = true"><span data-ng-i18next="_stats.TOT"></span></div>
    </div>
    <div class="filter-button" data-ng-class="{toggled: showfilters==true}" data-ng-click="filtertoggle()">
      <i class="icon icon-remove" data-ng-show="showfilters==true"></i>
      <i class="icon icon-cog" data-ng-show="showfilters==false"></i>
    </div>
    <div class="sib-table-filters" data-ng-show="showfilters==true">
      <div class="filter-row stats-filters">
        <span class="hidden-sm" data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.tableFilters"></span>
        <div class="filters">
          <select id='filter-division' name="division" data-ng-model="selectedFilters.division" data-ng-options="d.display for d in filterData.division"></select>
          <select id='filter-conference' name="conference" data-ng-model="selectedFilters.conference" data-ng-options="c.display for c in filterData.conference"></select>
          <select id='filter-seasonType' data-ng-model="selectedFilters.seasonType" data-ng-options="st.display for st in filterData.seasonType"></select>
          <select id='filter-year' name="year" data-ng-model="selectedFilters.season" data-ng-options="s.display for s in filterData.season"></select>
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="filter-apply" data-ng-click="filterTable()"><span data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.go"></span></a>
        </div>
      </div> <!-- / .filter-row -->
    </div>
  </div>
  <div data-ng-show="tabletabbed=='avg'">  <!-- Average Table Start -->
    <div class="sib-full-team-stats">
      <table  class="sib-zebra-stripes">
        <thead>
          <tr class="headers">
            <th data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.rank" class="not-sortable rank"></th>
            <th data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.team" class="not-sortable team-name"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.games'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.games')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.G"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.fgpct'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.fgpct')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.FG%"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.tppct'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.tppct')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.3P%"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.ftpct'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.ftpct')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.FT%"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.offRebsPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.offRebsPg')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.OREB"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.defRebsPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.defRebsPg')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.DREB"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.rebsPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.rebsPg')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.RPG"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.assistsPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.assistsPg')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.APG"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.turnoversPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.turnoversPg', false)" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.TO"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.stealsPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.stealsPg')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.SPG"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.blocksPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.blocksPg')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.BPG"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.foulsPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.foulsPg', false)" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.PF"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.pointsPg'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.pointsPg')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.PPG"></th>
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody data-ng-show="!moduleLoading">
          <tr data-ng-show="!teams">
            <td colspan="100%" data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.noMatch"></td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-ng-repeat="(rank, team) in teams | orderBy:predicate:reverse">
            <td class="sorted rank">
              <span data-ng-show="predicate == null || (reverse && positivelyViewed) || (!reverse && !positivelyViewed)">
                {{ rank + 1 }}
              </span>
              <span data-ng-show="predicate != null && (!reverse && positivelyViewed) || (reverse && !positivelyViewed)">
                {{ teams.length - rank }}
              </span>
            </td>
            <td class="team-name"><a sib-team-urls team="team.profile" data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.profile.code }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.name"></span></a></td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.games | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.fgpct | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.tppct | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.ftpct | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.offRebsPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.defRebsPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.rebsPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.assistsPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.turnoversPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.stealsPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.blocksPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.foulsPg | number:1 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.pointsPg | number:1 }}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
      </table>
      <div data-ng-show="moduleLoading" class="preloader">
        <img src="/media/img/loader.gif" /><br/>
      </div>
      <div class="table-footer" data-ng-show="!moduleLoading">
        <div class="pagination" data-ng-show="paginate">
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=1" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==1}"></a>
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=2" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==2}"></a>
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=3" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==3}"></a>
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=4" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==4}"></a>
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=5" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==5}"></a>
        </div>
        <!-- 
        <a data-ng-href="http://stats.nba.com/leagueTeamGeneral.html" target="_blank" class="footer-link"><span data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.seePastStats"></span></a>
         -->
      </div>
    </div>
  </div><!-- Average Table End -->
  <div data-ng-show="tabletabbed=='total'">  <!-- Totals Table Start -->
    <div class="sib-full-team-stats">
      <table  class="sib-zebra-stripes">
        <thead>
          <tr class="headers">
            <th data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.rank" class="not-sortable rank"></th>
            <th data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.team" class="not-sortable team-name"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statAverage.games'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statAverage.games')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.G"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.fgm'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.fgm')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.FGM"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.fga'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.fga')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.FGA"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.tpm'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.tpm')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.3PM"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.tpa'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.tpa')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.3PA"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.ftm'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.ftm')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.FTM"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.fta'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.fta')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.FTA"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.offRebs'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.offRebs')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.OREB"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.defRebs'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.defRebs')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.DREB"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.rebs'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.rebs')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.REB"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.assists'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.assists')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.AST"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.steals'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.steals')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.STL"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.blocks'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.blocks')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.BLK"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.turnovers'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.turnovers', false)" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.TO"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.fouls'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.fouls', false)" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.PF"></th>
            <th data-ng-class="{sorted: predicate == 'statTotal.points'}" data-ng-click="sortTable('statTotal.points')" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center" data-ng-i18next="_stats.PTS"></th>
          </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody data-ng-show="!moduleLoading">
          <tr data-ng-show="!teams">
            <td colspan="100%" data-ng-i18next="fullTeamStats.nomMatch"></td>
          </tr>
          <tr data-ng-repeat="(rank, team) in teams | orderBy:predicate:reverse">
            <td class="sorted rank">
              <span data-ng-show="predicate == null || (reverse && positivelyViewed) || (!reverse && !positivelyViewed)">
                {{ rank + 1 }}
              </span>
              <span data-ng-show="predicate != null && (!reverse && positivelyViewed) || (reverse && !positivelyViewed)">
                {{ teams.length - rank }}
              </span>
            </td>
            <td class="team-name"><a sib-team-urls team="team.profile" data-ng-href="/teams/#!/{{ team.profile.code }}"><span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.city"></span> <span data-ng-bind-html="team.profile.name"></span></a></td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center">{{ team.statAverage.games | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.fgm | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.fga | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.tpm | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==2" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.tpa | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.ftm | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.fta | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.offRebs | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==3" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.defRebs | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.rebs | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.assists | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.steals | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.blocks | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==4" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.turnovers | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.fouls | number:0 }}</td>
            <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==5" class="center">{{ team.statTotal.points | number:0 }}</td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
      </table>
      <div data-ng-show="moduleLoading" class="preloader">
        <img src="/media/img/loader.gif" /><br/>
      </div>
      <div class="table-footer" data-ng-show="!moduleLoading">

          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=1" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==1}"></a>

                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/jogos-que-eu-vi/1.html" >Blog do Lédio Carmona</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/pc-vasconcellos/1.html" >Blog do PC Vasconcellos</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/blog-do-renatinho/1.html" >Blog do Renatinho</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/cest-le-foot/1.html" >C&#39;est Le Foot</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/platb/canal-campeao/" >É Campeão</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/entre-as-canetas/1.html" >Entre as Canetas</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/lance-livre/1.html" >Lance Livre</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/mundo-moto/1.html" >Mundomoto</a></li>

                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/ponta-de-lanca/1.html" >Ponta de Lança</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/blogs/especial-blog/ultimmato/1.html" >UltiMMAto</a></li>
                            


                        

    

        
                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class="glb-grid-2 large-2 column">
                
                <ul class="divisoria">
                
        

                    <li class="diretorio-indice">
                        
                            <strong>Institucional</strong>
                        
                    </li>


                        


                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://www.grupoglobo.globo.com/" >Grupo Globo</a></li>

                </ul>
            </div>

         </div>
    </div>
</div>
